attributes.action: Call an immediate general election. The majority of the country want this.
attributes.background: Call an immediate general election. The majority of the country want this, the promises made during the last general election campaign have not been upheld and we are once again seeing more gradual decline of the country and our own citizens living standards.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
